about_the_game:
This artbook is a collection of concept art, drawings, sketches and iterations. Enjoy the characters and world from Pulling No Punches in a way you have never seen before, including comments from our artist Kainã Lacerda about the creative process!

The digital artbook is delivered in a PDF (Acrobat Reader) format and was originally created for our crowdfunding backers.

content_descriptors.notes: Foul language, insults and swearing. Cartoonish violence, blood and gore.
